    • Method Detail

      • Classify

        public void Classify()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     java.lang.Exception
        Reads in the file, spesified in the constructor and "classifies"/predicts data based on that. Source: https://weka.wikispaces.com/Use+Weka+in+your+Java+code#Classification-Classifying instances
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Failure has happened in the data to predict during data reading in.
        java.lang.Exception - Reading of the model from modelpath has failed or if an error occurred during the prediction.

      • getGenre

        public java.lang.String getGenre(int i)
        Returns the Genre of the specified instance i predicted, if input file contains only one file than i should be 0. Returns null if no classification has happened or if index number i is larger than number of instances of songs predicted.
        Parameters:
        i - is Index number
        Returns:
        String containing the genre
